CASE-2025-1000.title: Financial Fraud Investigation #1
CASE-2025-1000.full_description: Detailed investigation into financial fraud activity reported in Malmö.

evidence.ai_summary: The suspect was identified entering the facility at 02:00 AM via the CCTV footage. Facial recognition matches the database record for known subject A. The timeline indicates a 15-minute window where data exfiltration occurred.

The suspect was identified entering the facility at 02:00 AM via the CCTV footage. Facial recognition matches the database record for known subject A. The timeline indicates a 15-minute window where data exfiltration occurred.
Image enhancement of the license plate from the traffic camera confirms the vehicle presence at the crime scene. The vehicle is registered to the primary suspect.

CASE-2025-1002.title: Narcotics Investigation #3
CASE-2025-1002.full_description: Detailed investigation into narcotics activity reported in Gothenburg.

evidence.ai_summary: The suspect was identified entering the facility at 02:00 AM via the CCTV footage. Facial recognition matches the database record for known subject A. The timeline indicates a 15-minute window where data exfiltration occurred.
Document forensics on the seized hard drive uncovered encrypted ledgers. Decryption revealed transactions totaling $5M to anonymous wallets. Metadata indicates the files were created on 2024-12-10.
Audio analysis reveals a conversation discussing the transfer of funds. Voice biometrics confirm User B's identity. Keywords 'offshore', 'crypto', and 'ledger' were detected with 98% confidence.
